page.title: 12RYTON PARK.
page.content: The park is very clean and tidy. It has pretty flowers all around it and nice green grass. There is a bridge with a little{waterfall}and a field to play{football}on. At the bottom of the park there are{swings, a slide and a {roundabout.}The park also has a{tennis {court}and a{bowling green. There are different coloured {budgies}in a big cage. Next to the cage is a shop that sells sweets, ice cream and drinks. There is an open air{swimming pool and a{paddling pool. I go to the park about three or four times a month. Nearly everyone goes there when it is hot. You can have picnics there in Summer. People come from Newcastle, and sometimes even futher away, to visit our park in the Summer.
